content.description: Peanut Butter Falcon climbs a vertical face with a slab next to it on the left. Use all holds and the Arete to top this one out. Very good hold orientation and moves for a VB. Good warmup for the harder lines nearby.Start with hands matched on a vertical crimp pinch to the left of center and the use whatever you want to get to the top!Salt Water Redneck is a V2+/3 variation which does not use the Arete. More dynamic and more grip if Peanut Butter Falcon was not enough!

Lottery Ticket Smirk starts matched on sidepull jugs in a right facing finger crack. Start with feet low or get them high and lift off in control. Work the decreasingly sized and increasingly sharp holds as you go up. Launch off the last two razors to slap the lip (or be tall) and mantle to top out!
content.location: (34.7427222, -98.7495207) Middle of Lottery Ticket Wall. Faces NW.

content.description:
Lottery Ticket Wall features vertical and overhung boulders in a nice hangout area with good views of the Off Limits Zone north of the highway.  

  Hike southeast from Bird Trap parking or directly south from the small dirt pullout just east of the curve in the HWY. 

  Head uphill on the elk trails and try to stay on the NNE aspect of the slope.  

  Lots of V2-4 lines on the wall and other boulders nearby have 5/6/7 type problems ready to be developed.
